markdownRemark.html:
'The Sun Warriors' is a web based tank game application implemented by Achini Herath and me. The game can accommodate up to five players in a round, competing against each other for life & coins. The game had a multiplayer mode and an AI mode. Along with the game, we developed a website featuring information about the game. The project incorporated the technologies C#.NET, PHP, CSS, HTML, JavaScript and Adobe Photoshop.

View Project on GitHub
